additional_modules.description: Comma-separated list of modules to load.

additional_schemas.description: Loads additional schemas provided in the slapd package.

admin_password.description: Administrator password. Defaults to 'admin' if not defined.

config_password.description: Allows password protected access to the dn=config branch. This helps to reconfigure the server without interruption.

cpus.description: CPU shares to allocate to each OpenLDAP node.

force_reconfigure.description: Reconfigure the service after the image has been initialized. Defaults to FALSE

host_volume.description: The location of a volume on the host to be used for persisting OpenLDAP data. The final location will be derived from this value plus the name set in `name` (e.g. `/mnt/host_volume/openldap`). Note that this path must be the same on all DCOS agents. Required.

mem.description: Memory to allocate to each OpenLDAP node.

port.description: Port number to be used for clear communication

port_ssl.description: Port number to be used for secure communication

virtual_host.description: Virtual Host URL to be used in the external load balancer. Modify as per your installation.

name.description: The name of the OpenLDAP service instance
